Class AdminView

java.lang.Object
views.AdminView
public class AdminView extends Object
Class representing the administrator view in the hospital management system. This class provides methods to display menus and interact with the user for managing hospital staff, appointments, medication inventory, and doctor schedules.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AdminView()
    Displays the main administrator menu.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdminView

      public AdminView()
      Displays the main administrator menu. This menu allows the admin to select options to manage staff, appointments, inventory, doctor schedules, or log out.

  • Method Details

    • displayMenu

      public void displayMenu()
      Displays the main administrator menu.

    • displayStaffMenu

      public void displayStaffMenu()
      Displays the staff management submenu.

    • displayMedicationMenu

      public void displayMedicationMenu()
      Displays the medication inventory and replenishment submenu.

    • displayDoctorScheduleMenu

      public void displayDoctorScheduleMenu()
      Displays the doctor schedules submenu.

    • displayStaffList

      public void displayStaffList(List<User> staff)
      Displays a list of hospital staff members. The staff list includes their user ID, name, and role.
      Parameters:
      staff - The list of staff members to display.

    • displayAppointments

      public void displayAppointments(List<Appointment> appointments)
      Displays the details of appointments. The appointment details include the appointment ID, doctor ID, patient ID, and status.
      Parameters:
      appointments - The list of appointments to display.

    • displayInventory

      public void displayInventory(List<InventoryItem> inventory)
      Displays medication inventory.
      Parameters:
      inventory - The list of inventory items.

    • displayReplenishmentRequests

      public void displayReplenishmentRequests(List<InventoryItem> inventory)
      Displays replenishment requests based on inventory items with pending requests.
      Parameters:
      inventory - The list of inventory items.

    • displayDoctorSchedule

      public void displayDoctorSchedule(List<String> schedule, List<Appointment> appointments, String doctorID)
      Displays the schedule for a specific doctor. The schedule shows the date-time, booking status, and patient ID for each time slot.
      Parameters:
      schedule - The list of schedule entries for a doctor.
      appointments - The list of all appointments to check against.
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor whose schedule is being displayed.

    • getUserChoice

      public int getUserChoice()
      Gets the user's main menu choice.
      Returns:
      The user's choice as an integer.
